description: Source file for editing wireless network configuration, including UI elements, form handling, and security mode settings.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Fetches configuration parameters with specific root object and parameter mapping.

methods.name: showDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog for Wi-Fi security mode selection and updates configuration based on user input.

methods.name: restyle_div
methods.description: Removes and adds CSS classes to style form sections dynamically.

methods.name: addslashes
methods.description: Escapes backslashes and quotes in strings for safe inclusion in JSON and JavaScript.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Submits the Wi-Fi configuration form data via AJAX to server for saving.

methods.name: setResetInfo
methods.description: Calls server API to reset or restore Wi-Fi settings based on user action.

methods.name: init_form
methods.description: Initializes the configuration form, sets default values, and provides validation rules.
